channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: At Starbase, SpaceX is taking firefighting into its own hands
item.description: SpaceX's company town has formed a volunteer fire department, extending control over both the emergency response and permitting process as the company...

item.title: Spotify partners with Netflix for video podcast distribution deal
item.description: Spotify is partnering with Netflix to bring select video podcasts to the streaming platform starting in early 2026. The deal will feature curated show...

item.title: Feds Seize Record-Breaking $15 Billion in Bitcoin From Alleged Scam Empire
item.description: Officials in the US and UK have taken sweeping action against “one of the largest investment fraud operations in history,” confiscating a historic amo...

item.title: Inaudible sound might be the next frontier in wildfire defense
item.description: Sonic Fire Tech has developed a device that can extinguish flames using acoustic energy below the range of human hearing. The startup is building a de...

item.title: Impulse Space details plan to deliver up to 6 tons a year to the Moon
item.description: Impulse Space sees a growing demand for mid-sized deliveries to the moon.

item.title: Sam Altman says ChatGPT will soon allow erotica for adult users
item.description: OpenAI says it will soon roll back some of ChatGPT's safeguards, and even allow the chatbot to engage in erotica for adult users.

item.title: A Plan to Rebuild Gaza Lists Nearly 30 Companies. Many Say They’re Not Involved

item.title: Do You Really Have to Stop Using Windows 10?
item.description: Microsoft has stopped supporting the operating system. If you’re still running Windows 10, here are your options.

item.title: 4 Apple Airtags Are $65 Right Now
item.description: Track your favorite stuff for a fraction of the usual price.

item.title: Interstellar Comet 3I/ATLAS Is Spewing Water Like a Cosmic Fire Hydrant
